title: 9/5- INDUSTRIAL LIVE/WORK LOFT HEAVEN *amenities
neighborhood: Clinton Hill - Bed-Stuy - 1 block to G subway
posting_body: ['THE COOLEST NO FEE LOFT ON THE MARKET, COME AND GET IT.', 'Internationals are easily accepted.', "Over the course of 8 years, I've lived in 3 apartments in the building.", "It's been amazing to watch this community and neighborhood as a whole grow together.", "FANTASTIC neighborhood if you're unfamiliar, essentials all around.", 'Chase Bank, supermarket, cafes, bodegas at the corner alone.', 'Barons (the restaurant) and Home Depot are just in back of us.', '7 minute walk to Von King Park (dog run / newly renovated lawn / outdoor amphitheater with weekend music).', '10 minute bike ride to Fort Greene Park (local veggies and hand-made textiles weekly!), 15 minute bike ride to Domino Park (right on the water / view of city).', '10 minute bus straight to Downtown Brooklyn (Whole Foods, Target, Apple Store, Atlantic Terminal).', '20 minute bike ride to Prospect Park.', '**', 'The building is 1 block to the subway, VERY EASY TO GET TO MANHATTAN.', 'First come first served, we take one application at a time*', 'The community is absolutely terrific - I love my neighbors, and the management is top notch.', 'The Super is very attentive and lives with his family in the building.', 'The landlord is not only friendly, but a good communicator if any issues arises as well.', 'K041 Lofts has a spectacular unit available come September 5th for a year lease.', 'With soaring 18 ft ceilings, massive windows, and plenty of floor place.', '1 floor walk-up, pets allowed, and amenity building.', 'We have a projector movie theater, stroller parking, car parking, a sunny loft gym, dance studio, pool table wifi lounge, laundry (via app), free bike storage, and two gigantic rooftops with 360 views including the Manhattan skyline!', 'Get creative with that floor space and wall space!', 'Perfect for big rugs, hanging plants, wall decor, film projector, EVEN great height for acrobatics!', 'We have a couple in the building :)', 'There is a king size windowless room-', 'You can utilize this as a bedroom (most do).', "I've seen gorgeous walk-in closets, soundproof music studios, nurseries, etc. Renovated kitchen with island with full size steel appliances including dishwasher, microwave, and gas stove (great for bills).", 'The bathroom is large with stone floors and stone wall.', 'There is a deep tub great for baths.', 'Perfect if you have a pup or a little one too!', 'If you are interested, PLEASE email me right away for the application.', 'Talk soon!', 'It is occupied so let me know time frames that work for you this week.']
